description: Values of phi in arithmetic progression of at least 6 terms having the same value of phi in A050518.
links: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..114
maple: N:= 10^7: # to get all terms <= N in A050518with(numtheory):Res:= NULL:phis:= {seq(phi(i), i=2..N)}:for m in phis do   S:= convert(invphi(m), set);   if nops(S) < 6 then next fi;   for d from 0 to 4 do     Sd[d]:= select(t-> (t mod 5 = d), S, d);     nd:= nops(Sd[d]);     for i0 from 1 to nd-1 do       s0:= Sd[d][i0];       if s0 > N then break fi;       for i5 from i0+1 to nd do         s5:= Sd[d][i5];         incr:= (s5 - s0)/5;         if {s0+incr, s0+2*incr, s0+3*incr, s0+4*incr} subset S then           Res:= Res, [s0, m];         fi       od     od;   od;od:map2(op,2,sort([Res], (s, t)->s[1]<t[1])); # _Robert Israel_, May 10 2015
author: _Jud McCranie_, Dec 28 1999
